channel.title: Code on Code Before Breach
channel.description: Recent content in Code on Code Before Breach

item.title: How I Managed Unmaintained Open Source with Gmail and Snyk Alerts
item.description: When API access falls short, automation through Gmail and Apps Script becomes essential. Here’s how I used Google Apps Script to collect Snyk vulnerability alerts and patch data automatically.

item.title: How to Block ECH and Mitigate DoH in Enterprise Networks
item.description: A hands-on guide using dnsmasq to filter SVCB and HTTPS records for disabling ECH and enforcing central DNS policies. Notes that DoH requires separate network-layer policies.
